Properties.Name: Blend Mode
Properties.Tooltip:
Blend state 

Opaque: Opaque object 

Cutout: Opaque object with cutout parts decided by the alpha channel of the main texture

Fade: Transparent object that does completely fade out at 0 opacity 

Transparent: Transparent object that is still visible at 0 opacity due to the fresnel effect, more realistic than fade 

Dither: uses a dithering pattern to simulate transparent objects

Properties.Name: Cull Mode
Properties.Tooltip:
Controls which face of the mesh is rendered 

Off: Double sided 

Front: Single sided (internal parts showing) 

Back: Single sided

Properties.Name: Stencil Options
Properties.Tooltip: Stencil related options for the material

Properties.Name: Stencil operation
Properties.Tooltip: Operation done in case the stencil comparison returns true
